underlying_goal: Fix two CI failures (ruff format violation and GCP auth error from module-level Connector initialization), add pre-commit hooks for notebook linting, commit/push changes to existing PR, and add a Streaming Data Loader deploy job to CI
friction_detail: Ruff path was incorrect on first verification attempt, requiring re-execution from project root.
brief_summary: User asked to fix two CI failures (formatting and lazy initialization), add pre-commit hooks, commit/push to PR, and plan a deploy job; all were completed except the deploy job which ended at the planning stage.
